title: Samsung Dishwasher Door Switch
description: Samsung Dishwasher Door Switch ★★★★★ ★★★★★ 6 Reviews PartSelect Number PS12394435 Manufacturer Part Number DD81-02132A This door switch is for dishwashers. The door switch detects when the door is closed so the dishwasher can start. Unplug the dishwasher or shut off the house circuit breaker before installing this part. Wear work gloves to protect your hands.

installationInstructions.author: Rehan from ELKRIDGE, MD
installationInstructions.title: Door latch and switch broke. Door would not close and engage
installationInstructions.content: Repair was fairly simple. Remove torx screws making sure that front control panel does not separate too much from door panel. Not a big deal if it does, just a little more work when putting it back together. Replacing broken part is plug and play. Reseat door panel and control panel and secure with previously removed torx screws. I’ve probably made it sound a bit more complicated than is really is.
